data.taskTitle: Homogenize project indicator in Create New Task drawer
data.approach: Uppercase the project name in the TaskCreationDrawer header badge to match the project tabs styling. The dot/bullet is actually a color indicator which is correct behavior.

suggestedTasks.title: Audit UI Component Naming Conventions
suggestedTasks.description:
Review and standardize naming and display conventions across task creation and project interfaces. Specifically:
- Ensure consistent capitalization for project names
- Validate display logic for project indicators
- Create a style guide for UI text formatting
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered inconsistent UI text formatting during task implementation

gotchas: Previous implementation used lowercase and dot notation
